mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee(id , pw, name, gender, department) VALUE (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{department});
mapper.select: SELECT approval FROM employee WHERE id = #{id};
SELECT pw FROM employee WHERE id = #{id};

SELECT e.name, ed.department_name as departmentName, p.position_name as positionName FROM employee e INNER JOIN employee_department ed ON e.department = ed.department_id INNER JOIN position p ON e.position = p.position_id WHERE e.id = #{id};
